apa uthsaha gatha yuththe ema shakthiya niwaradi margaya wetha yomu karagena jiwithe yahapath aakarayen hasuruwa gannatayi.”ese kiyamin apa ha sanwadayata elambaune merata prawina adhyapanagnyayaku, supathala dharmacharyawarayaku hitapu wibhaga komasariswarayaku wagema hanwalla rajasinha madi widuhala ha kolambaa rajakiya widuhalwala widuhalpathiwarayaku lesa sewaya kota wishrama suwayen pasuwana bogoda pe්ramarathna mahatha.heta (15) wanidata jiwithaye anu wani wiyata elambaena pe්ramarathna mahatha dan siya jiwithaye sandhya bhagaya sahamulinma yodawanne sasaramaga keti karaganime udarathara wyayamaya udesayi.nawasiya wisi eke marthu mase pahaloswanida ohu upanne siyana korale athishaya ramaniya nisansala parisarayakin yuthu kanduboda gammanayedi.

maknisada ka්risthuswahanse numbaala nisa wadhawinda, numbaala unwahansege adipare yana pinisa numbaalata aadarshayak di giyaseka. 22 unwahanse kisi papayak nokalaseka, unwahansege mukhayehi wanchawakda sambawune natha. 23 unwahanse ninda karanu labu kala ninda nokalaseka; wadhawinda kala tharjana nokara, dharmishta lesa winishchaya karana thananwahanseta karanaya bharadunseka. 24 apa papawalata nasi dharmishatamata jiwath wana pinisa, unwahansema thamange sharirayen gasapitadi apage papayan isuluseka; unwahansege thuwala walin numbaala suwa karanu labuwahuya. 25 maknisada numbaala bataluwan men mulawa yamin sitiyahuya, numuth dan numbaalage aathma wala enderada rakawalada wethata hari awith sitinnahuya. 1 pethras 3
